price: 66. Eddcluk diggah usun teetik yakmeeniih, bagitte teetik kiban.
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَأٓكِلُونَ مِنۡهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum laākilūna min'hā famāliūna min'hā al-buṭūna
